    • joinTeam

      public Team joinTeam(String teamName, String playerEmail) throws NoSuchElementException, IllegalArgumentException
      Adds a player to a team.
      Parameters:
      teamName - name of the team
      playerEmail - email of the player
      Returns:
      the updated Team object
      Throws:
      NoSuchElementException - if the team or player do not exist
      IllegalArgumentException - if the player is already in the team or the team is full

    • updateTeam

      public Team updateTeam(String name, int level, int score, int lives, boolean active) throws NoSuchElementException
      Updates a team with given parameters.
      Parameters:
      name - name of the team
      level - new level of the team
      score - new score of the team
      lives - new remaining lives of the team
      active - active status of the team
      Returns:
      the updated Team object
      Throws:
      NoSuchElementException - if team was not found
